description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) class called ConversationResponse, used for representing information about a conversation in an API response within the intelligent chatbots service platform.

classes.name: ConversationResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing the response data for a conversation, including identifiers, status, language, channel, and timestamps.

methods.name: ConversationResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an empty ConversationResponse object.

methods.name: ConversationResponse
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing a ConversationResponse with specific details.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the conversation.

methods.name: getPassengerId
methods.description: Returns the passenger's unique identifier associated with the conversation.

methods.name: getLanguageCode
methods.description: Returns the language code used in the conversation.

methods.name: getChannel
methods.description: Returns the communication channel used for the conversation.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the conversation.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the conversation was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the conversation was last updated.
